publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2717 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Gaelic Language (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Gaelic Language (Scotland) Bill, debate on groups of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time-limits indicated (each time limit being calculated from when the Stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when the meeting of the Parliament is suspended or otherwise not in progress): Groups 1 and 2 – 30 minutes Group 3 – 55 minutes Groups 4 to 6 – 1 hour and 15 minutes Supported by: Tavish Scott*
